column2: A proven leader of project/engineering teams with the ability to achieve positive outcomes for the customer while empowering and growing the individuals within the team.
An Operations/Engineering/Project Manager with extensive Integrated Materials Handling System experience. With a proven track record of leading teams in a line and project management environment.
Experience in selecting, mentoring, building and leading a team of Engineers/PM's using best practice processes.
Excellent communicator able to relate to people at all levels and support and grow teams in a constructive manner.
Very responsive and customer focused individual able to find the right balance between keeping the customer happy while ensuring this is not at the expense of the company/project profitability.
Enthusiastic, motivated and driven individual who is always open to new ideas and always looking for ways to do things smarter, faster and better.
Organised and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and troubleshoot effectively to reach a suitable resolution to issues.

Adaptable and effective leader with proven track record in Australia, China and USA.","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Greater Enschede Area', 'city': None, 'state': None, 'default': 'Greater
